1000s of Atlantic salmon escape from fish farm into Pacific - Firm admits it doesn’t know how many of its 305,000 fish are left after a net ‘failure’. “It’s a devastation. We don’t want those fish preying on our baby salmon. And we don’t want them getting up in the rivers.”

Julian Assange slams 'absurd' US plan to label WikiLeaks 'non-state intelligence service'; Assange has spoken out against a passing US Senate bill which aims to officially label his Wikileaks as a non-state hostile intelligence service that is "abetted by state actors and should be treated as such".
A Russian tanker has traveled through the northern sea route in record speed and without an icebreaker escort for the first time, highlighting how climate change is opening up the high Arctic.
